title: Prokopis Pavlopoulos - Wikipedia
snippet: Prokopios "Prokopis" Pavlopoulos (Greek: Προκόπιος "Προκόπης" Παυλόπουλος, pronounced [proˈkopis pavˈlopulos]; born 10 July 1950) is a Greek retired politician, who served as the president of Greece from 2015 to 2020. A member of New Democracy, he previously was ...

title: Prokopis Pavlopoulos facts for kids
snippet: Prokopis Pavlopoulos is a Greek politician who served as the President of Greece from 2015 to 2020. He was a member of the New Democracy political party. Before becoming president, he was the Minister of the Interior from 2004 to 2009.

title: Prokopis Pavlopoulos
snippet: Prokopis Pavlopoulos (Greek: Πρόκοπος Παυλόπουλος; born 10 July 1950) is a Greek jurist, academic, and retired politician who served as President of Greece from 13 March 2015 to 13 March 2020.

title: About: Prokopis Pavlopoulos

title: Prokopis Pavlopoulos Biography | Pantheon
snippet: Prokopios "Prokopis" Pavlopoulos (Greek: Προκόπιος "Προκόπης" Παυλόπουλος, pronounced [proˈkopis pavˈlopulos]; born 10 July 1950) is a Greek retired politician, who served as the president of Greece from 2015 to 2020.
